QuestData.Title: Sunken Treasure
QuestData.Description: The key to the cage is held by Tony Two-Tusk, the pirate admiral, and he's guarded by ogres that you'll never be able to kill!$B$B<Wizzle cries some more and then looks up, an idea forming in his brain.>$B$BI've got it! What do all pirates want more than anything else? No, not grog. Something even better... treasure!$B$BThey had a ship full of treasure that was sunk by a giant whale-shark. The treasure is scattered all over down in the Mirage Abyss to the northwest.$B$BGo get it!
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh gosh, do you already have all of that sunken treasure?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh yeah! Look at all that booty.$B$BWait a minute... bring it closer!
